title: 233 - Brucey Blue Trucks
description: Today's episode of The Pod opens up with the boys all catching up with an almost full barn! Mitt is back and Bruce has re-ignited the truck wars in the office with his big blue truck. The boys then dive into the pod for, which is a folder of all things compiled on the internet. Today's folder includes Author’s latest podcast, the Rings of Power, a dive in the Expendables universe and much much more. Don't forget to subscribe to the Youtube Channel, and submit your questions or comments to the Pod FOD at @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all, we'll see you Wednesday.
